title: MTA Earn Rewards Funding - August
body:
The EARN reward pools need to be funded for the month of August, and this vote is to ratify the movement of those funds into the mStable EARN funding address.

The funding includes the ongoing rewards that cover all EARN pools, staking returns, and vaults.

A total amount of 1,211,540 MTA is required for 4 weeks of funding, plus an additional week buffer as a safety precaution after [MCCP-8](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-8) ends, and MTA will be sent to the mStable EARN funding address for disbursement should the vote be successful: 0x437E8C54Db5C66Bb3D80D2FF156e9bfe31a017db

**Should we fund the next month's worth of MTA EARN rewards?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
